divs: sighting details (you can type over theseinstructions.)please limit your narrative to 500 words (equivalent to 1 typedpage). i was walking westward on cortland which is a road situated on the southside of a half-wild hill of grass called bernal heights.the library had justclosed and the sky was dark.i just finished looking at some books at that samelibrary,in san francisco (city-county).i was feeling bored so started looking atcelestial objects(as i was ambulating downhill,westward),and noted that betweenvenus in the west and jupiter(near middle of sky) a intense white-light about asluminous as venus just showed up.i just noticed it hovering there for about 25seconds,first in awe,then in some dread.this phenomena was roughly in the middlebetween the two planets mentioned,this paragraph.it then just blinked\winkedout.later thinking about it i called an observatory and asked if iridium flarescould hover.they responded in the negative.pls.let me know if you identifiedit.(an iridium flare-neither iridium nor flare-is part of the satillite systemfor cell phones.it flares up when a solar panel is oriented toward the sun.)s\ak
trends: There have been 127 other sightings in San Francisco
There were no other sightings in San Francisco on or around January 19th 2001
Summary: Intense white light hovering at night in Jan,2001,
